youtube.title: YouTube Tips
youtube.respondToComments: Respond to comments to build community

step1.title: Choose Platform & Post Type
step1.guidance: Let's start! Pick your social media platform and the type of post you want to create. This helps us tailor your content for maximum impact. 🎯
tips: 💡 Facebook: Great for community engagement and longer stories
📸 Instagram: Perfect for visual content and aesthetic posts
💼 LinkedIn: Best for professional insights and networking
🐦 Twitter: Ideal for quick updates and trending topics
🎵 TikTok: Great for fun, creative, and viral content
📺 YouTube: Perfect for detailed explanations and tutorials

step2.title: Set Tone, Audience & Structure
step2.guidance: Next, select the tone, audience, and structure. Want to be fun, professional, or inspirational? Choose what fits your vibe! ✨
tips: 😊 Engaging: Perfect for starting conversations and getting comments
💼 Professional: Great for business updates and industry insights
😄 Casual: Ideal for behind-the-scenes and personal stories
😂 Humorous: Best for entertainment and viral potential
✨ Inspirational: Perfect for motivation and positive vibes
📚 Educational: Great for sharing knowledge and tips

step3.title: Enter Your Content
step3.guidance: Now, write your main message. Don't stress—just jot down your thoughts. We'll help polish it up! 💡
tips: 💭 Start with what you want to say - don't worry about perfection
🎯 Include a clear main point or message
💬 Think about what would make someone want to comment
📝 Use natural, conversational language
🔥 Add personal stories or examples if relevant
❓ Ask questions to encourage engagement

step4.title: Review & Enhance
step4.guidance: Almost there! Review your post and let us enhance it for clarity, engagement, and style. 🚀
tips: ✨ We'll add emojis and formatting for visual appeal
📏 Optimize length for your chosen platform
🎯 Improve clarity and readability
💬 Add engaging elements like questions or calls-to-action
🔤 Fix grammar and improve flow
📱 Make it mobile-friendly and scannable

step5.title: Preview & Save
step5.guidance: See how your post will look, then save or share it! You did it! 🎉
tips: 👀 Preview how it looks on your chosen platform
📋 Copy the text to paste directly into your social media
💾 Save for later use or reference
🔄 Make any final edits if needed
📤 Ready to post and engage with your audience!
🎊 Congratulations on creating great content!

facebook.title: 📘 Facebook Optimization
tips: 40-60 words: Perfect for quick updates, announcements, and event promotions
80-120 words: Ideal for personal stories, community engagement, and behind-the-scenes content
150-200 words: Great for detailed updates, educational content, and thought leadership
250-350 words: Perfect for comprehensive stories, detailed experiences, and in-depth insights
Best practices: Use questions to encourage comments, include call-to-actions, post during peak hours (1-4 PM)

instagram.title: 📸 Instagram Optimization
tips: 25-40 words: Short, punchy captions with emojis and 3-5 relevant hashtags
60-90 words: Story captions with bullet points, emojis, and visual appeal
120-180 words: Carousel captions for multi-image posts with detailed descriptions
200-300 words: IGTV descriptions for longer video content
Best practices: Use emojis strategically, include bullet points (•), add 3-5 hashtags at the end, use line breaks for readability

linkedin.title: 💼 LinkedIn Optimization
tips: 50-80 words: Brief professional announcements, updates, and quick insights
100-150 words: Industry insights, thought leadership, and professional tips
200-300 words: Professional stories, case studies, and detailed experiences
400-600 words: Article previews, comprehensive insights, and in-depth professional content
Best practices: Use professional tone, include industry hashtags, post during business hours (9 AM-5 PM), focus on value-driven content
